alert.note: Alert for Houston; Macon; Montgomery; Robertson; Stewart; Sumner; Trousdale (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 31 at 2:29AM CST until February 01 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM CST THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one half of an inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one half of an inch and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Portions of Middle Tennessee. * WHEN...For the first Winter Weather Advisory, until 9 AM CST this morning. For the second Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 PM CST this evening to 6 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Houston; Macon; Montgomery; Robertson; Stewart; Sumner; Trousdale
